Reviews.Title: Simple Yet Better Than Expected
Reviews.Author: D. Knowles
Reviews.Content: I've had my phone for at least a year and I have been able to take and send pictures, text, play games and have access to the internet through Crickets mobile web. When I'm not at my computer, I can send and receive emails on my phone and even go on Facebook and Google. Really is a great phone for those that don't want to spend a ton of money on a smartphone and the big monthly bill of data charges.

Reviews.Title: Big failure
Reviews.Author: prana "prana"
Reviews.Content: Well the phone may work fine, but the bluetooth is a big failure. It CAN'T transfer files like  pictures,  soundfile, ringtones... So if your friend want to send you a picture... you must say "this stupid phone don't support that..."

Reviews.Title: AVOID CRICKET
Reviews.Author: Lucky Addison "Just an Ex Soldier"
Reviews.Content: AVOID THE UNLIMITED CARDS - They say $10 Unlimited - what you get is 200 minutes and someone on the phone at Cricket Customer support rep telling you there is no such card.  FRUSTRATING! - GO BOOST MOBILE or VIRGIN.

ProductInfo.Features:
1.3MP Camera, Bluetooth and QWERTY Keyboard.
Navigation, Text and Picture Messaging.
Up to 300 minutes of talk time and up to 250 hours of stand-by time.
Nationwide Coverage.
ProductInfo.Name: Cricket MSGM8 Pay As You Go Tri-Band Cell Phone
